title: List connections
description: Lists all BigQuery connections defined in a specific Google Cloud project and location.

objective.narrative: This sample helps developers programmatically enumerate all available BigQuery connections within a specific project and location. This is useful for auditing, management, or dynamically selecting a connection for a query or to populate a user interface.

regionTags.name: bigqueryconnection_v1_connectionservice_connections_list
regionTags.title: List connections
regionTags.description: Lists all BigQuery connections defined in a specific Google Cloud project and location.
